attributes.title: They should make a pea emoji: 🪀
attributes.review:
This app is a no no for me it took 37 years to download, and I assure you I have the finest data in all of New York Sewer area. When I first entered the app I was greeted by a screen full of hairy armpits with extremely long hair. Each INDIVIDUAL hair had an odd looking smile on it like 🙂+🤥+😏 which ended up looking like a interesting emoji therefore a weird smile on every singular hair. Like whattttt. Anyways then the app proceeded to hack my phone and change my wall paper to pictures of un manicured toes. Each of my apps logos had been replaced by those plastic baby’s (you by from amazon) head. And most importantly my precious live wallpaper of very hot 90s actors was changed to a bunch of giant green peas with Trumps face morphed onto it. And they where dancing like they had a wegie and where trying to hold in a big dump. The peas has stick sized legs and don’t even get me started on how that is physically impossible for noodle legs to hold up a 201 pound fat dancing pea. How do I know the weight I don’t I’m just assuming. (Kids is is not okay to assume things like, gender, ethnicity, etc. but in this case it’s fine) So if you want your phone to look like a bunch of objects with creepy faces on them get the app. And if not don’t it’s as simple as that.

                                        -Pea Pea Lady 🙂🩲

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app took over 1 week to download.This app deleted everything on my phone and all my passwords and everything there for I had to purchase a new phone would not recommend this crappy app.Thank you have a nice day!

attributes.title: Disgusting 🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app is a trap for black people. Once downloaded the Trumps Kkklan 👻along with congress track down innocent people of color👨🏿👩🏾. When they tracked me down they kidnapped me. Trump said “I’ll let you go when you vote trump 2020” I responded with, I ain’t voting for no orange🍊. So he sent me to jail forcing me to put my phone up my butt🍑 to type this now.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app🤢!!!!!!
attributes.review: This app toke forever to download! “ when the app finally open it ask for your phone number.so I put my Phone number in and I started to receive weird phone calls. One call they said “trump 2020” I can’t believe why some would still support someone who non-racist, homophobic, non misogynistic and more. Overall the app glitches and I would give this app a rating of 0 I can’t🙄 this app is disappointing.
